articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Cash dominates India playbooks as markets recoil from oil shock
articles.description: Surging oil prices have battered market sentiment toward major energy importer India, pushing down the rupee to a record low and dragging stocks and bonds. With few signs the commodity boom will end soon, investors are bracing for more possible losses.
articles.content: Cash dominates India playbooks as markets recoil from oil shock
